item.title: About Me
item.description: I’ve been a Web Developer for almost a decade. Unfortunately, developing with Accessibility in mind hasn’t always been a part of my process. This all changed about three years ago when I watched a video titled “Keeping Web Accessibility in Mind”, opens in a new tab, window, which provides and overview of some of the difficulties users with disabilities are faced with on the web today. That video was a complete eye-opener for me.
